title: Engineering Design Process
description: A master template to structure projects that follow the engineering design cycle from problem definition to testing and iteration.

hypotheses.description: State an initial hypothesis or design assumption about how your solution will meet the requirements.

materials.description: Bill of materials (BOM): parts, components, tools, software, costs, and suppliers.

experiment.description: Prototype plan and test procedures. Define metrics, constraints, and acceptance criteria.

observation & data.description: Test logs, performance measurements, issues found, and iteration notes.

results.description: Summarize test outcomes versus requirements (tables, charts, pass/fail).

conclusion.description: Assess whether the design meets requirements, trade-offs made, and next iteration plan.

questions & research.description: Prior art, standards, constraints, user research, and open questions.

headshots.description: Team member headshot image URLs or file references.
